    • Method Detail

      • movePlayer

        public void movePlayer()
        Method is responsible for handling player moving. Method is running every 20 milliseconds in EventGameSynchronizator, whenever player is moving.

      • jumpPlayer

        public void jumpPlayer()
        Method is responsible for handling player jump. Method is running every 20 milliseconds in EventGameSynchronizator, whenever player is jumping.

      • moveDynamicBackgroundElements

        private void moveDynamicBackgroundElements()
        Method is responsible for moving every background object to the next position on the screen, when player is moving.

      • moveSynchronizedElements

        private void moveSynchronizedElements()
        Method is responsible for moving every synchronized, by the value of player movement.

      • changeScalarPositionOfObject

        protected void changeScalarPositionOfObject(float x,
                                            float y,
                                            boolean setObjectCoordinatesToBeEqual)
        Method is responsible for moving object, using scalar values(true navigation values). It can set values, by adding them or set them to be equal.
        Parameters:
        x - Distance to move in X axis
        y - Distance to move in Y axis
        setObjectCoordinatesToBeEqual - set true, if new coordinates values need to be exacly that value, set false to just add them to coordinates

        Method is responsible for checking position of player enemies.
